sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"摘要，概要，概括"之意。
means: summary ： 普通用词，指将书籍或文章等的内容，用寥寥数语作简明扼要的说明。
abstract ： 指论文、书籍等正文前的内容摘要，尤指学术论文或法律文件的研究提要。
digest ： 侧重对原文融汇贯通，重新谋篇布局，以简明扼要的语言，简短篇幅成文，展现原作精华。
outline ： 指配以释议文字的提纲。
resume ： 源于洁语，与summary极相近，通常可互换使用。

sentence.Network_en: What follows is a brief summary of the process.
sentence.Network_cn: 接下来是对此流程的一个简短概括。

sentence.Network_en: Viewers saw him anchoring a five-minute summary of regional news.
sentence.Network_cn: 观众看见他主持一个5分钟的地方新闻摘要节目。

sentence.Network_en: It says torture and summary execution are common.
sentence.Network_cn: 那上面称酷刑和草草处决很常见。

lj.lj_ly: in summary, there is no clear case for one tax system compared to another.
lj.lj_ls: 简要地说，并没有明确理据说一种税制优于另一种税制。

means.word_mean: 即刻的,直接的,迅速的,草率的,突然的
简明的,简洁的,压缩的,削减的,大意的,精练的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an adjective): from Latin summarius, from summa 'sum total' (see sum)

encyclopedia.content: 英文词汇 [ˈsʌməri] n. 摘要， 概要 adj. 1.即刻的， 立即的 2.匆忙的， 草率的 2.概括的； 简要的HTML 标签 定义和用法 <summary> 标签包含 details 元素的标题，"details" 元素用于描述有关文档或文档片段的详细信息。 实例 <details> <summary>HTML 5</summary>This document teaches you everything you have to learn about HTML 5. </details>

entry.def: A summary of something is a short account of it, which gives the main points but not the details.

example.ex: What follows is a brief summary of the process...
example.tran: 接下来是对此流程的一个简短概括。

example.ex: Here's a summary of the day's news...

entry.def: Summary actions are done without delay, often when something else should have been done first or done instead.

example.ex: It says torture and summary execution are common...
example.tran: 那上面称酷刑和草草处决很常见。

example.ex: There is no doubt that some considered that a beating was no more than summary justice...
example.tran: 毫无疑问，有人认为拷打比草菅人命好不到哪去。

means.word_mean: 1. a briefstatement that presents the main points in a concise form;

sentences.sentence: "he gave a summary of the conclusions"

means.word_mean: 2. briefly giving the gist of something;

sentences.sentence: "a compact style is brief and pithy"
"a summary formulation of a wide-ranging subject"

auth_sentence.content: I did receive a detailed summary of trial results.
auth_sentence.res_content: I did receive a detailed summary of trial results.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I did receive a detailed summary of trial results.

auth_sentence.content: Watch the latest news summary from BBC World News.
auth_sentence.res_content: Watch the latest news summary from BBC World News.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Watch the latest news summary from BBC World News.

auth_sentence.content: It is simply a consensus summary of the science.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is simply a consensus summary of the science.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is simply a consensus summary of the science.

stems_affixes.word_buile: summ总,加+ary表形容词或名词→内容总和→摘要
summ总,加+ary表形容词或名词→内容总和→摘要
consummate[adj.完全的,完美的 v.完成]+ion表名词→n.达到极点,完成
summ总,加+ation表名词→n.[数]总和,和,合计

stems_affixes.value_cn: 顶,最高点;颠峰,高峰;最高级会议
stems_affixes.word_buile: summ总,加+it表名词→山的顶峰像数量总和一样→最高[多]数量→最高峰
summary[n.摘要,概要 adj.概括的,简略的]+ize表动词→summarize概括,总结

means.word_mean: 摘要, 概要, 总结, 概括

sentences.en: He made a summary of what had been done.
I'm giving you a summary of facts.
He was given the summary punishment.

means.word_mean: 匆忙的, 草率的, 从速从简的, 即决的

sentences.en: She complained about the summary treatment given her.
sentences.cn: 她抱怨对她草率的对待。

means.word_mean: 概括的; 简要的, 总结性的, 概要的

sentences.en: That is a summary and ironic end.
sentences.cn: 那是一个具有概括性和讽刺意味的结局。

jushi.english: He made a summary of what had been done.
jushi.chinese: 他将所做的事情作了个摘要。

jushi.english: I'm giving you a summary of facts.
That is a summary and ironic end.
jushi.chinese: 那是一个具有概括性和讽刺意味的结局。
